author: ekl
long_description:
# Cid Music Pack
Note: The ContentDB license is set to one that all of the media is compatible with. Check LICENSE.txt for the exact licenses things are used under.

This is a work in progress music pack for cid, primarily containing MIDI files under various CC licenses.

# Adding music
If you have a suggestion for music to add, feel free to send me a link to a MIDI file. Keep in mind that these must follow be compatible with CC-BY-SA-4.0.

You can also add them yourself and submit a pull request to the source repository with the media file and appropriate changes to LICENSE.txt.

Music can also be added to cid by creating your own mods.
name: cid_music_pack
short_description: A bunch of music for Cid Music Player
title: Cid Music Pack
